alert.note: Alert for Grant; Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 2:54PM CDT until September 19 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kay County in northern Oklahoma... East central Grant County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Braman to 3 miles south of Blackwell to 3 miles northeast of Lamont, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Blackwell, Tonkawa, Kildare, and northwestern Kaw Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
